Name: Ayumi Hamasaki nihongo2
Occupation: Singer, songwriter, record producer, composer, actress, model, spokesperson

description: Many of Hamasaki's songs are dance tunes, such as "Evolution" (2001), a self-composed single that also has rock elements.
description2: "M", the first song composed by Hamasaki under the pseudonym "Crea", shifts to a relative key, like most of her self-composed songs.<ref name
